column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " I wish Pabu were here .
#Text=Zhu Li ... " Ahnah says : " Well look what we caught .
#Text=Wonder if they were tracking us after we escaped .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hello fellow travelers !
#Text=I do n't suppose you can help us out of this net ?
#Text=" Ahnah says : " Why would we free a couple of lowly Earth Empire soldiers ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Lowly ?
#Text=We were part of Kuvira 's inner circle !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Were , not anymore !
#Text=Please , just , let us out !
#Text=" Baraz says : " I know just what to do with a couple of Kuvira 's top men .
#Text=" Mako says : " I wonder what 's taking Wu so long .
#Text=He 's not one to miss out on lunch .
#Text=I 'll go check on him .
#Text=" Mako says : " Wu , are you in here ?
#Text=Come on , your octopus fritters are getting cold .
#Text="
